## PerformanceStatistics.getAsSimpleFrameStatistics() method

Convert to a plain object that can be serialized. Required to copy the test results over to nightwatch.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAsSimpleFrameStatistics(onlyLastFrame?: boolean): SimpleFrameStatistics;
```
